servinfo.title: Exhaust system Inspection

attention1.ptxt: To avoid danger of being burned, do not touch exhaust system when it is still hot. Any service on exhaust system should be performed when it is cool.

servinfo.ptxt: Check exhaust system for loose, damage, leakage, etc. referring to Exhaust System Check:For Petrol Engine Model or Exhaust System Check:For Diesel Engine Model .
